channel.title: Scar Error Anyone got a solution?
channel.description:
Well first off all thank you for trying to help me ^^
been trying to fix it for 3hours
Line 45: [Error] (15777:29): Unknown identifier 'x' in script C:\Downloads\SCAR 3.13\includes\SRL/SRL/Extended/xMapWalk.scar
Please Explain it so i can understand im Quite new at this! ^_^ :confused:

item.title: Scar Error Anyone got a solution?
item.dc:creator: @iron_man_ftw iron man ftw
item.description:
@iron_man_ftw wrote:

I had this problem too, but i found out that for me the (x,y,…) things don’t work with SCAR 3.13 Divi, not for me anyways. So just get SCAR 2.03, it compiles okay then. If not that then you maybe installed it wierd or something.

For it to work with the later SCARS (for me) you have to do something like this:

procedure thing;
var
x,y:integer;
begin
yourthinghere

Read full topic
item.source: Scar Error Anyone got a solution?

item.title: Scar Error Anyone got a solution?
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

I assume the script is old. SRL 4.0 released removed some global variables, such as x, y. To be safe, use a newer script.

Read full topic
